loans.name: Faiziev

texts.ru:
Шараф добропорядочный и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Жена домохозяйка занимается воспитанием детей. Шараф занимается откармливанием скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается с детства с семи лет. Шараф очень мечтал учится но из за финансовых трудностей он не смог получить образование. Поэтому теперь ему приходится заниматься откормом скота. Но Шарафу нравится этот вид деятельности так как от этого бизнеса он получает хорошую прибыль. Так как у Шарафа двое детей он старается делать все,чтобы его дети не нуждались не в чем. Он мечтает чтобы его дети учились в лучших учебных заведениях и в будущем работали по профессии.      
 На данный момент Шараф планирует увеличить свое стадо и хочет купить скот.  Он недавно от своих знакомых узнал про организацию Арванд и решил подать заявку на кредит,так как на покупку скота у него не хватает денежных средств.Шараф заранее благодарит организацию Арванд за поддержку
texts.en: Faiziev is an honest and hard working man. He is married and has two children. His wife stays at home to raise the children. Faiziev raises livestock, an activity he has been involved with since he was seven years old. He always dreamed of being educated, but financial issues stopped him from pursuing that goal, so he is now raising animals. However, he does like his work because he receives a good income from it. Since Faiziev has two children he is doing everything he can to provide them with all they need. He dreams that his children will study in the best educational institutions and work in their chosen specialties. Currently Faiziev is planning to expand his herd and wants to buy more livestock. He recently learned from friends about the organization Arvand and decided to apply for a loan, since he does not have enough cash to buy the animals. Faiziev thanks you ahead of time for your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Manuel Roger

texts.es:
Manuel tiene 27 años de edad de estado civil soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en casa de ellos en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Pertenece a la VRC GENESIS, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto atascoso, Pertenece al Cantón ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

Manuel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para  comprar urea, semillas, abonos y fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes.

Las compras y las ventas las realizará en Guaranda. El desafío a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y enfermedades en las siembras.

El sueño es tener un negocio propio como una tienda de abarrotes. En el tiempo libre le gusta fútbol.
texts.en:
Manuel is 27 years old and he is single with no children. He lives with his parents in their house in the city of Ventanas in the province of los Rios. 

He belongs to VRC GENESIS, that is located in the precincts of Atascoso, he also belongs to Cantón that is dedicated to agriculture and livestock.

Manuel is in agriculture and he plants corn and rice. He is asking for this credit to purchase fertilizers and seeds. With the help of this credit, he will be able to purchase fertilizers. 

He makes his sales and purchases in Guaranda. The biggest challenge he faces are the plagues and illnesses that effect his crops. 

His dream is to have his own business like a grocery store. In his free time he likes to play soccer.

loans.use: purchase fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Najmiddin

texts.ru: Начмиддин жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 38 лет. Он женат и имеет четверых замечательных детей. Со своей семьёй Начмидин живёт в сельском посёлке. Его дети учатся в местной школе, Начмидин и его жена стараются делать всё возможное, чтобы их дети получили хорошее образование для своего будущего. Чтобы иметь постоянный доход Начмидин занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже как 18 лет он откармливает и выращивает скот. Для этого неподалёку от дома у него есть поле, где он может пасти скот. Также в этом деле ему помогает жена. Она ухаживает за скотом и получает от коров молоко. А сам Начмидин также работает в местной больнице, откуда получает дополнительный доход. Но постоянный и стабильный доход он получает от купли продажи скота. Дом, в котором живёт Начмидин со своей семьёй становится для них маловат, так как дети растут и нуждаются в большом пространстве. Поэтому Начмидин в ближайшем будущем планирует построить большой дом для своей семьи. Но для этого ему нужны денежные средства. Он может накопить деньги, если увеличится прибыль от его бизнеса. Поэтому сейчас Начмидин хочет купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и продажи. Для этого он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит для покупки скота. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Najmiddin is a cheerful 38 year old man. He is married and has four wonderful children. He and his family live in a rural town. The children attend the local school and Najmiddin and his wife try to do everything possible to ensure that they are well educated and prepared for the future. Najmiddin started his own business because he wanted a steady income. Now it has already been 18 years since he started raising animals to sell. He has a field near his home where the livestock can graze. His wife also helps him. She cares for the animals and milks the cows. Najmiddin himself also works in the local hospital, which provides additional income. But the more predictable and stable income comes from selling livestock. The house where Najmiddin and his family lives feels too small, since the children are growing and need more room. Najmiddin wants to build a large house for his family soon, but he needs money to do so. He can start saving if he can increase the income from his business. So now Najmiddin wants to buy a few more head of livestock to raise and sell. To do this he came to Arvand for a loan. He is grateful for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Fatumata

texts.en:
Please meet 44 year-old Fatumata from Paynesville North in Liberia.  Paynesville North has the largest market in Montserrado County.  The area is home to “round time marketers”, traders who travel to the interior to purchase various goods to sell throughout the county.  As a result, there is a high concentration of wholesalers in the area who distribute to various markets around Montserrado County, including Monrovia. 

Fatumata completed 6th grade and she is married.  She describes herself as a working person.  Her husband works with an importer of used cars in Monrovia. Fatumata has a shop which sells lappa (Traditional cloth mainly used by African women).  She has been in business for 18 years and works 10 hours each day at her business.  With this loan, she will buy Lappa to increase her sales.  One of the greatest challenges that she faces is few goods in her shop.  She transports her goods by bus.  She started her business with money from her father.  She is proud of her business because she makes more profits. Her plan is to own a house.  She thanks you in advance for your support!

loans.use: to buy Lappa to increase her sales.

loans.name: Marcetin

texts.en: Marcetin is a married woman from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. She is a married woman and the mother of two young children. She runs a sari-sari or variety store where she sells various goods and items to the people in the area. Marcetin is asking for a loan to buy more stock of canned goods, soap, toiletries, soda and other beverages to sell. In this way, she will be able to able to expand her stock and attract more buyers. Marcetin dreams of making her business sustainable, and a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock of canned goods, soap, toiletries, soda and other beverages to sell.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара целеустремленный и деловой человек. Она занимается торговым бизнесом в последние два года. Ей 41 год. Она разведена и имеет троих сыновей, которых воспитывает одна без помощи мужа. Старшему сыну 21 год и он работает в компании мобильной связи, среднему сыну 19 лет и он зарабатывает на жизнь работая продавцом в супермаркете, а младшему сыну 6 лет и он скоро будет ходить в школу. Гулсара очень любит своих сыновей. Она всегда заботится о них, а они в свою очередь заботятся о матери. Гулсара на рынке арендует торговую точку, где занимается продажей женской и детской одежды. Ее бизнес приносит ей стабильный доход. Гулсара намерена увеличить ассортимент товара и тем самым расширить бизнес. Для этой цели она просит кредит в размере 2000 долларов США. Данный кредит помог бы ей разнообразить ассортимент сезонной детской и женской одежды и увеличить ее товарооборот. Гулсара верит в Вашу помощь в развитии ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Gulsara is a goal oriented and hard working person. She has worked in sales for the last two years. She is 41 years old, divorced, and has three sons who she is raising alone, without help from her husband. The oldest son is 21 and works for a cell phone company. The middle son is 19 and earns a living working as a clerk at a supermarket. Her youngest son is six and will soon be starting school. Gulsara loves her sons very much. She cares for them, and they in turn care for her.

 Gulsara is renting a market stall where she sells women's and children's clothing. Her business provides a stable income. She wants to expand her inventory and in doing so, expand her business. With that goal in mind she is asking for a $2000 USD loan. The loan will help her to diversify her inventory of women's and children's clothing and improve her turnover. Gulsara trusts in your help in developing her business.

loans.use: Buy seasonal children's and women's clothing to expand her business.

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Please meet 40-year-old Comfort from Paynesville North in Liberia. Paynesville North has the largest market in Montserrado County. The area is home to “round time marketers”, traders that travel to the interior to purchase various goods to sell throughout the county. As a result, there is a high concentration of wholesalers in the area who distribute to various markets around Montserrado County, including Monrovia. 

Comfort has obtained a university degree and she is unmarried.  She describes herself as hardworking and intelligent person. Her fiancée works with the Ministry Of Land and Mines in Monrovia.

Comfort has a shop which sells lappa, dresses, blouses, etc. She has been in this business for 8 years and works 10 hours each day at her business.  With this loan, she will buy additional inventory to resell. One of the greatest challenges that she faces is lack of inventory in her shop. She transports her goods by bus.  She started her business with money from her fiancee.  She is proud of her business because she makes a good profit. Her plans are to own a house, and buy a car. She thanks you in advanced for your support!

loans.use: to buy lappa, dresses, and blouses to resell.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es: Doña Gloria, 48 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Estelí, se dedica a vender comida desde hace 15 años   tiene un puesto bonito con cuatro mesas con sus sillas, su cocina donde prepara los deliciosos platillos que como dice ella ¨solo con el olor los clientes las siguen¨. Ella empezó trabajando desde muy joven aun cuando sus hijos estaban pequeños, solo tenía sus pequeños ahorros pudo salir adelante a pesar que no tenía mucho capital de trabajo  ahora su comideria es muy popular tiene bastante clientela. Ella está solicitando este crédito porque quiere invertir en el negocio para comprar los productos por mayor como el arroz, azúcar, aceite, condimentos los productos que no son perecederos. Sus planes futuras son mejorar las condiciones de su comedor para hacerlo más atractivo para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Doña Gloria, age 48, lives in the city of Estelí, and has made a living selling food for 15 years. She has a beautiful stand with four tables and chairs.  She has a kitchen, where the delicious plates are prepared, and she says that "only the smell makes the customers follow".  She started working when she was very young, when her children were still small.  She only had their small savings, but could succeed despite lacking a lot of working capital.  Now, her food stand is very popular and she has plenty of customers.  

She is requesting this loan because she wants to invest in the business to buy wholesale products like rice, sugar, oil, and condiments, products that are non-perishable.  Her future plans are to improve the conditions of the dining area to make it more attractive for her customers.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es:
Juana, vive con su esposo y disfruta de cinco hijos, depende tres de ella y mientras que los otros dos trabajan, ayudan para los gastos del hogar. Juana, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y siembra de granos básicos.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios tales como: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas, plaguicidas, insecticidas, entre otros; esta inversión le ayudara a obtener una mejor cosecha de maíz.
Su sueño es tener su negocio con una excelente demanda y satisfacer a los clientes.
texts.en:
Juana lives with her husband and five children, three of whom are dependent while the other two work and contribute to the household expenses. Juana sells tortillas and grows basic grains.
She is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy the farming supplies she needs, such as fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, fungicide, insecticide, etc. This investment will help her to improve her corn harvest.
Juana's dream is to have a high demand for her business and to satisfy her customer's demands.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicide, pesticide, fungicide, insecticide, etc.

loans.name: Sarafeen

texts.en: Sarafeen is a 47 year-old hardworking and diligent woman. She has three children, and her husband has been running a butcher shop for ten years. He sells fresh meat and his clients are very satisfied with his services.  His customer base is increasing with the passage of time. Currently, he wants to renovate his butcher shop to attract more customers. He would build one more room in his shop to add some more space as the current space is too congested. For that purpose, Sarafeen has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. As this business is the only source of income for her family, so this loan is very important for them. Sarafeen would spend the profit on the education of her children and would make them good responsible citizens of Pakistan.

loans.use: To expand the butcher shop

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración  de totopostes (panes tostados hechos de maíz) desde hace varios años tiene mucha cliente pues sus productos son muy buenos y aprecios accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Sandra esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar los ingredientes necesarios para seguir elaborando los totopostes como: maíz, huevos, manteca, azúcar, etc. por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Sandra is 31 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and three children in a house they own. She manufactures and sells "totopostes", a kind of toasted bread made from corn. She has been doing this for several years and has a high client base because her products are very good and have affordable prices. With the profit from the sales she contributes to the household expenses.
Sandra is asking for a loan to buy the ingredients she needs to prepare the "totopostes", such as corn, eggs, lard, sugar, etc. She will buy these supplies wholesale. This will allow her to keep her business, which is her only source of work, going, and will allow her to provide for her family without limitations.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn, eggs, lard, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Gulumali

texts.en:
Gulumali is a cheerful man, age 36. He is married and has one school-age child. He lives with his family in a rural area. His wife helps him with his work. To have a stable income, Gulumali works with livestock. His wife helps him and takes care of the cows while they are being fattened. She also sells the dairy products provided by the cows' milk. 

Now, the family's expenses are increasing since his son is going to school and he has costs that need to be provided for. Gulumali wants to expand his business to increase their income enough. He dreams of having a large family. He has turned to VFAC to take a loan to buy feed for his animals. He hopes for a positive outcome and is grateful for VFAC support.

loans.use: to buy feed for his animals.

loans.name: Sakunna's Group

texts.en:
Sakunna, 43, lives in a rural area of Pursat province. She has one son who is still in school. 

For ten years, she has been an owner of a food stall in her local area and her husband has been an electrical repairman to provide supplemental income, to feed the family. Sakunna can earn about KHR 19,300 per day from her current business.

Sakunna has been with VisionFund Cambodia, Kiva’s partner, for one cycle and she has successfully paid back the loan. Now, she is leading her group of two other members to apply for a new loan from VisionFund Cambodia. 

As the leader, Sakunna will use the loan to buy materials for supporting her husband's business. She hopes this loan will enable her to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy materials for supporting her husband's business.

loans.name: Cristeta

texts.en:
This is Cristeta, 53, a resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. She is married to Nelson and they have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. They both work hard to provide income for their everyday needs.

Cristeta operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a Php 5 worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a Php 25,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Cristeta hopes to continuously expand her business and dreams to have a good life.  She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Shakar

texts.ru: Шакар добродушная пожилая  женщина  в возрасте 52 лет. Замужем и имеет трое взрослых детей. Всю свою совместную с мужем жизнь Шакар проживает хорошо, муж понимает её и помогает ей во всём. Шакар активная женщина, она не любит сидеть без дела. Её даже называют активисткой посёлка. Она работает в школе уборщицей, эта работа приносит ей дополнительный доход. Также много времени она уделяет на то, чтобы помогать своим детям в воспитании их собственных детей. Но чтобы иметь постоянный доход для проживания, Шакар занимается своим собственным бизнесом. Она разводит скот. Сейчас в наличии у неё 2 скота. Этот бизнес приносит ей хороший доход, который расходуется на пропитание. Но этого дохода не хватает, чтобы удовлетворять другие нужды семьи. Например, Шакар живут в доме, который находится в плохом состоянии и требует капитального ремонта. Но пока  у них нет столько денежных средств, чтобы позволить сделать ремонт. А сама Шакар мечтает построить большой дом для семьи с хорошими удобствами, чтобы она могла жить там со своими детьми и внуками. Но для этого ей нужно увеличить свою прибыль, чтобы накопить средства на строительство дома. Поэтому Шакар хочет взять кредит, чтобы купить несколько голов скота для увеличения своего бизнеса, и получаемую прибыль она будет копить на строительство нового дома. Она очень надеется на поддержу Арванд и заранее благодарит!
texts.en: Shakar is a wonderful older woman. She is married and has three grown children. Shakar has had a good married life: her husband understands her and helps with everything. Shakar is an active woman: she always likes to have something to do. People even call her a town activist. She works in the school as a janitor, which earns her additional income. She also spends a lot of time helping her children raise their children. But she has her own business which earns her a stable income to cover living expenses: she raises livestock. Right now she has two animals. The business brings her a good profit, which covers food, but not enough for the other needs of the family. For example, Shakar's house is in bad shape and needs major repairs, but they don't yet have the financial resources to pay for them. Shakar herself dreams of building a large house with good living conditions where she could live with her children and grandchildren. But to do that she will need to increase her income so that she can save for construction. This is why Shakar wants a loan: so that she can buy several head of livestock to expand her business and save the resulting income for construction of a new house. She hopes for your support and thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Sughra

texts.en:
Sughra is 29 years old, and the responsible mother of 2 children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her husband and children. Her husband is a janitor in a hospital. Since his salary is not enough to meet the household expenses, he would like to start his own business. 

Sughra has requested a loan from Kiva’s partner BRAC Pakistan. Her husband will purchase a rickshaw using the loan amount and he will drive the rickshaw during the night while maintaining his present job. In this way he will increase the family's monthly income and he and Sughra will be able to send their children to school.

Sughra is very hopeful for this loan and she is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase a rickshaw.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Ruben de 56 años de edad  es un hombre  muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia.  Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos,  es muy trabajador, siempre lo ha realizado con alegría y entusiasmo, se dedica a ser agricultura siembra todos los años los principales granos básicos de la zona como lo son, maíz y frijol.  Ruben  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso visitó las oficinas de INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, pesticidas entre otros. Desea contar con la ayuda solicitada puesto que no tiene otros ingresos monetarios, y así el seguirá llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Ruben is 56 years old and lives with his wife and children. He is very responsible with respect to his household duties and has always provided the best for his family. He is a hard-working farmer and has always worked with joy and enthusiasm. Every year he sows the main basic grains from the region: corn and beans.
Ruben wants to increase his sales and that is why he contacted the field partner, Integral, to ask for a loan that will allow him to purchase seeds, manure, chemical fertilizer, pesticides, etc. He wants to make use of the loan because he doesn't have any additional sources of income and this will allow him to keep providing for his family without limitations.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, fertilizer, pesticide, etc.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra de 32 años de edad es muy amable y trabajadora, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos, Ella trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maiz y frijol; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en el granero que muestra la fotografia para luego salir a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia. Sandra  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga, fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, ella ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en: Sandra, 32 years old, is very friendly and hard working. She lives with her husband and three children. She works very hard on her own plot of land where she plants corn and beans. Her products are of very good quality. When the harvest is ready she stores it in the silo, as shown in the photo, so that she can later go out and sell it at different markets that are near her home. Sandra is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Integral so she will have the needed money to purchase farming supplies such as pest control, fertilizer, compost, seeds, and other things that she needs for her planting. She longs to increase her sales to be able to generate better revenues and give her family better financial stability.

loans.use: purchase pest control, fertilizer, compost, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Carmen De Jesús

texts.es:
carmen tiene 50 años de edad, es madres soltera de cuatro hijos. Ella  tiene varios años de dedicarse al comercio de comida, golosinas, etc. Ya que posee un cafetín,  en el  Centro Escolar de su localidad actividades que ha desarrollado durante varios años. se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su hijos para preparar lo que venderán en el en transcurso del día mientras su hijo mayor cuida las vacas y va a trabajar la parcela que siembran. Compra las golosinas, pan, pollo y carne,etc en la ciudad, que esta  a 8 Kilómetros del lugar en donde reside.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una novilla que le vende un vecino.  De esta manera,  incrementara la producción de leche; ya que posee  venta de leche y considera que le proporciona suficientes ingresos y suplira la demanda que posee lo que le generara mejores ingreso para el sustento de su familia. Ella desea brindarles una mejor educación a sus hijos y que se vuelvan personas de bien.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 50 year old single mother with four children.  For several years, she has been engaged in selling meals, sweets, and other products as she owns a small café in the school center in her town, an activity that she developed over several years.  She and her children rise at 5:00 am to prepare the food they will sell in the course of the day, while her oldest son takes care of the cows and goes to work the land they sow.  She buys sweets, bread, chicken, meat, and other foods in the city, located eight kilometers from her home.

The loan she is requesting from ”Fundación Campo” is for the purchase of a heifer that a neighbor is selling her.  In this way, she will increase milk production because she feels that the milk sales will provide enough income and will supply her demand while generating better income to support her family.  She wishes to provide her children with a better education and wants them to become good people.  
.

loans.use: to purchase a heifer that her neighbor is selling her.

loans.name: Moussodjeton   2 Group

texts.fr:
Les  membres du groupe  MOUSSODJETON 2 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 35 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles traditionnelles à DJALAKORO, un des villages de San, 4ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur 5 eme prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est  l’arachide  avec   AWA, 1 ere assise de la droite vers la gauche, sur la photo. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte  acheter des intrants, semence, des petits matériels agricoles et payer les frais de labour  pour l’exploitation de 1 hectare. 
La production sera vendue au niveau du village et à San, après la récolte, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice  de 45.000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Moussodjeton 2 group are married women averaging 35 years of age, with four children. They all live in traditional families in Djalakoro, a village in the San  [prefecture], in the fourth administrative region of Mali. They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution in order to better manage their agricultural activities during the rainy season.

They are on their fifth loan with the institution. Their prior loans have been well repaid. They grow peanuts, as is the case of Awa, the first one seated on the right in the photo. With her loan, she plans to buy agricultural inputs [fertilizers etc], seeds, small agricultural tools and pay the cost of labor to work 1 ha [2.5 acres] of land. After harvesting, the produce will be sold in her village and in San, to a customer base composed of both men and women. She plans to earn 45,000 West African francs for the agricultural cycle. This revenue will allow her to pay off her loan and also to help her husband with everyday expenses.

loans.use: to pay for agricultural inputs, seeds, small tools and the cost of labor.

loans.name: Tanil Group

texts.es:
La señora Pati Maribel es de estado civil casada, tiene 30 años de edad, curso 2 años de educacion secundaria, tiene 1 hijo, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos, los compra pequeñitos luego espera a que engorden para después venderlos, inició este negocio por iniciativa propia ya que se vio en la necesidad de generar ingresos económicos para ayudar a la economía de su hogar y hasta la fecha lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de pollos y concentrado para los mismos, en el futuro desea tener una granja grande y rentable; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a venta de frutas, crianza de cerdos y venta de ropa. En la fotografía aparecen 9 personas pero solo a 8 se les concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Pati Maribel is 30 years old, married, has 2 years of secondary education, and has 1 child. She makes a living raising chickens. She buys them small, then waits for them to fatten, and sells them later on. She started this business on her own when she saw the need to generate income to help with her household finances.  To date she has 6 years of experience. 

She organized a group and is asking for a loan to buy chickens and feed for them.  In the future, she would like to have a large and profitable farm.  Other members of the group are involved in selling fruit, raising pigs, and selling clothes. In the photograph, there are 9 people, but only 8 were granted the loan.

loans.use: to buy chickens for fattening

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: El señor Ruben, es una persona de 22 años de edad, de estado civil soltero, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria y no cuenta con dependientes económicos a cargo. La actividad económica que desarrolla el señor Rubén es prestar servicios de constructor albañil jornalero en las diferentes obras que se presenta en la zona donde reside y zonas aledañas por el cual genera ingresos económicos diarios. Finalmente mencionar que el señor Rubén tiene ganas de seguir superándose y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para realizar la construcción de la muralla frontal de su lote de terreno en el cual a futuro tiene pensado construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ruben is 22 years old. He is single and finished primary education. He has no economic dependents. Ruben works as a construction worker in different construction sites in the area where he lives and nearby. This allows him to have a daily income.
Ruben is eager to better himself. This is why he is asking for a loan to build the front wall in his plot of land, where he is planning to build his house in the future.

loans.use: to build the front wall in his plot of land

loans.name: Pierre

texts.en: Pierre has already taken out three loans to launch his clean energy retail business. He is selling EarthSpark clean energy products on a resale basis in his community. After selling out the entire inventory he bought with his last loan, he still has customers calling him with more orders. He is taking out a fourth loan to help meet the demand in his community for a source of renewable energy that will allow customers to save money while helping the environment.

loans.use: To purchase stock for a clean energy business

loans.name: Jose Benedicto

texts.es:
José, vive con su compañera de vida, tiene dos hijos de 6 y 8 años de edad, no posee familiares en el extranjero. El se dedica  a las actividades agropecuarias tales como siembra de maíz y frijol, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años y lo aprendió de sus padres, a la fecha no presenta ningún problema.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios entre estos están: abono, herbicidas, pesticidas insecticidas, plaguicidas; esta inversión le ayudara a adquirir los materiales agropecuarios y con las ganancias aportara para su familia. 
Su sueño es apoyar a sus hijos  con los estudios y alimentación.
texts.en:
José lives with his wife. He has two children who are six and eight years old. He doesn't have any family living abroad. His work is in farming, such as in planting corn and beans. He has been doing this for 10 years, and he learned it form his parents. At this time, no problem presents itself.

The loan that he is requesting will allow him to purchase needed farming supplies, such as compost, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides, and pest control. This investment will help him obtain farming materials, and with the revenues, he will support his family.

His dream is to support his children's studies and nutrition.

loans.use: purchase compost, herbicides, pesticides, insecticides, and pest control.

loans.name: Lise

texts.en: Lise started selling EarthSpark clean energy products a few months ago. She has already taken out two loans to launch her clean energy retail business. After selling out the entire inventory she bought with her last loan, she still has customers calling with more orders. She is looking to increase her inventory, so is taking out a third loan to purchase solar desk lamps and charcoal-efficient cookstoves.

loans.use: To buy inventory for a clean energy business

loans.name: Auguste

texts.en: Auguste’s business is growing so steadily that he is coming back for another loan to increase his stock. Auguste started selling EarthSpark clean energy products a few months ago, integrating these products into his existing business. In addition to selling EarthSpark products, he also has a grocery store. He is looking to increase his inventory of solar desk lamps and charcoal-efficient cookstoves.

loans.use: To purchase stock for a clean energy business

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta se dedica a la venta de sandalias lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene 2 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, tienen mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia  con su esposo y su hijo, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor  y poder seguir con su negocio para obtener mejores ganancias que le ayuden a darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
The borrower sells sandals as a street vendor in the colonies close to where she lives. She has been doing this for 2 years. She has a lot of customers because her sandals are of very good quality and the prices are very affordable. With the profit form her sales, the borrower contributes to the household expenses. She lives with her husband and one child in a house they own.
The borrower is asking for a loan to purchase more merchandise wholesale to keep her business going. This will increase her profit, which will help her to provide more financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy sandals wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable con principios cristianos, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hijo de 2 años, hace 5 años se decidió dedicarse a la agricultura hoy siembra maíz y frijol, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar los insumos necesarios para seguir con su cosecha como: abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas,  herramientas, etc. pues esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The borrower is a very hardworking and responsible person with Christian morals. She lives in her own home with her husband and her two-year-old son. It has been five years since she decided to work in farming. Now, she plants corn and beans. The farm land is located in an agricultural zone. She sells in all the surrounding areas and already has many steady customers. These people always prefer her product because of the quality, and the prices are  affordable. Besides, the service is unequaled. The borrower is requesting a loan to be able to purchase the necessary supplies to continue harvesting, such as compost, fertilizer, seeds, herbicides, tools, etc. This is her only source of income, and to be able to generate better revenues would give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase compost, fertilizer, seeds, herbicides, tools, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La señora Maria tiene 34 años de edad, vive en la población de Cesarzama de la ciudad de Cochabamba, ella es soltera. La señora Maria vende comida específicamente anticuchos en la población de cesarzama, solo vende los sábados y domingos y el resto de los días se dedica a los trabajos como jornalera en la agricultura.  Maria vivía en el departamento de potosi hace como 10 años atrás ella tuvo que venirse a cesarzama porque no tuvo ingresos suficientes para poder mantener a su familia.  El préstamo que solicita Maria es para la construcción de vivienda y de esa manera podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y poder ayudar a sus hijas a terminar alguna carrera, sueña con un futuro mejor para sus hijas ya que ella no pudo terminar una carrera, pero ella quiere que sus hijas si puedan realizar una carrera y poder ayudar a las personas de la zona.
texts.en:
Maria is 34 years old. She lives in the village of Cesarzama of the city of Cochabamba. She is single. Maria sells meals, specifically, kebabs, in the village of Cesarzama. She only sells on Saturdays and Sundays, and on the rest of the days she does work such as being a day laborer for farms. Maria lived in the department of Potosi about 10 years ago. She had to come to Cesarzama because she didn't have enough income to be able to support her family.

The loan that Maria is requesting is for house construction. This way, she will be able to have a better quality of life and will be able to help her daughters finish their schooling. She dreams of a better future for her daughters because she was not able to finish school, but she wants her daughters to be able to have a career and help the people in the area.

loans.use: with home construction

loans.name: Dulce Claridad Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Anita microempresaria su negocio es la hecha y venta de nacatamales en su comunidad, vende además hielos,  repochetas y  helados desde hace dos años. Tiene 61 años de edad, es casada. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia primas para hacer nacatamales, como carne de cerdo, hojas de chagüites, arroz, achiote, sal, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, ajo, naranja agria, papas, tocinos etc. Martha tiene 32 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de pan y Daysi tiene 52 años de edad y su negocio es la elaboración y venta de churritos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three enterprising members.  One of them is Anita, a micro-entrepreneur.  Her business is making and selling nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales] in her community.  She also has sold ice, repochetas [filled corn tortillas], and ice cream for two years.  She's 61 years old and married.

She'll invest this loan in ingredients to make nacatamales: pork, banana leaves, rice, achiote, salt, tomatoes, peppers, onion, garlic, Seville oranges, potatoes, bacon, etc.

Martha, 32, sells bread, and Daysi, 52, makes and sells churritos [fried pastry filled with cheese].

loans.use: to buy ingredients for nacatamales

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: La Sra. Beatriz tiene 47 años, casada con tres hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar,  ella se dedica a la venta de ropa según la temporada y también zapatos,  ella vende sus producto de manera ambulante visitando distintos mercados  y ferias,  este préstamo es su  primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Beatriz va a usar este préstamo para la compra de ropa y zapatos por mayor como chompas y chamarras  para surtir su negocio ya que se acerca la época de frio, y esta época tiene mucha venta e incluso pedidos , su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital, la Sra. Beatriz enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia diaria, va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar un puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, la Sra. Beatriz se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le permite mejorar en su negocio.
texts.en: Beatriz is 47 years old.  She is married and has three school age children.  She sells seasonal clothing and shoes.  She sells her products on foot and visits various markets and fairs.  She is in her first loan sequence with the institution.  Beatriz is going to use this loan for the purchase of wholesale clothing and shoes such as sweaters and jackets to stock her business as the cold season in nearing and during this season, she has many sales and even orders.  The reason she is requesting this loan is because she doesn’t have capital.  In her business, Beatriz faces the challenge of daily competition.  She is going to use the benefits to buy a sales stand.  She wants to stock her business and offer a variety of products to her customers.  Beatriz feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they provide because it permits her to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale clothing and shoes.

loans.name: Santos Francisca

texts.es:
Santos tiene 26 años de edad,  vive con su familia que esta conformada por sus hijos una niña de 7 años y el niño de 2 años el esposo emigro hacia los estados unidos; para mejorar su condición de vida. Se de dedica a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa; pero desde pequeña le ayudaba a su papá en la siembra y cosecha del maíz ya que en la zona donde vive su papá siembran maíz. Hoy en día ella contrata a empleados para que le ayudad, debido a que su esposo no esta. Los insumos los adquiere en el pueblo mas cercano que esta a 15 kilómetros de su casa. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando la Fundación Campo, es para comprar fertilizantes, abono, herbicidas, pesticidas para cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz. 

La necesidad que sera cubierta por el crédito sera de mucha ayuda; por que no le alcanza el dinero para comenzar la siembra ya que se acerca la época de siembra. Desea, tener un mayor ingreso para su familia y del rastrojo que quede lo podrá vender para las persona que tienen ganado y así tendrá otra fuente de ingreso. 
 

		|
texts.en:
Santos is 26 and lives with her family (her children: a daughter, age 7, and a son, age 2). Her husband emigrated to the United States for a better quality of life. Santos knows how to do housework, but even as a child she helped her father to plant and harvest corn; in the are where her father lives, people plant corn. Today Santos hires labourers to help her because her husband is not there. She gets her supplies from the closest village, which is 15 kilometres from her home.
This loan which she is requesting from Fundacion Campo is for the purchase of fertilizers, manure, herbicides, and pesticides for the cultivation of 14,000 square metres of corn.
This loan will be a great help because it will cover a need. She does not have the money to start planting, and planting season is approaching. She wants to have a better income for her family. She will be able to sell the weeds that are left over to people who have livestock, and this will provide her with another source of income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure, herbicides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Nighat

texts.en:
Nighat is a 44-year-old woman. She is living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along with her husband and one child. 

Her husband is running a small shop, located at the corner of his street. Nighat has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. Since the summer season has arrived, to fulfill the demands of customers, her husband would like to keep some soft drinks in his shop. He would purchase cold drinks with the loan amount and this would increase his sales and income. 

Nighat is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks for her husband's business.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es: Eugenio de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos de 16 y 8 años de edad, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 7 años y eso le ha dado la experiencia para poder cosechar buenos productos, siembra maíz y sorgo,  con las ganancias que obtienen de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Eugenio esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y todo lo necesario para sus cosechas y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Eugenio, 35 years old, lives in his own home with his wife and two children, ages 16 and eight years. He has worked in farming for seven years and this has given him the experience to be able to harvest good products. He plants corn and sorghum. With the revenue he generate from his sales, he covers household expenses. Eugenio is requesting a loan to be able to purchase compost, seeds, fertilizer, and all that is necessary for his harvests so that he can generate better revenues to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase compost, seeds, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Pangestu

texts.en:
Pangestu runs a small stall which sells mobile phone airtime credits. Pangestu lives in Bogor, a semi-urban area about one hour from Jakarta.  Pangestu is single and living with five persons in the family home. 

Pangestu began working with Ruma three months ago because he is interested in selling mobile airtime. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. For the last three months, he has had around $60/day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). 

As the business continues, he hopes to get a Kiva loan as a working capital loan in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es:
Ana tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Se dedica al a agricultura desde que vivía, con su papá como a los doce años la empezó a llevar al terreno a cultivar. Ella comenta que le decía  “te va a servir en tu hogar”, hoy que tiene su familia,le esta sirviendo,pues de esa forma ha ayudado a su esposo, a demás posee una pequeña tienda,la cual con esfuerzos, la esta surtiendo,pues ya siente,que el trabajo del campo,le es  pesado,por eso su sueño es instalar una tienda fuerte. Ella se levanta muy temprano a las 5:00 a.m. A preparar el desayuno a su esposo, pues nunca le ha gustado que se vaya sin su café.

los materiales que necesita para cultivar, los compra algunas veces en la ciudad, para tomar el autobús ella tiene que caminar unos 30 minutos a pie;  si no toma una mototaxi le queda muy lejos. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar  una bolsa de semilla, dos galones de herbicidas, 11 sacos de abono, 2 litros de pesticidas. Con la inversión, comprara los insumos para la siembra,pues el invierno ya empezó y las milpas necesitan el abono.

Su deseo es, ampliar su pequeña tienda ya que la agricultura se vuelve pesada por la edad y ver su ultima hija graduada.
,
texts.en:
Ana is 50 years old, married and has two children.  She has been farming since she was a young girl.  At the age of 12 her dad would take her along with him when he went out to farm.  She says that he told her "it will help you when you have your own family".  Now that she does have her own family, it is indeed helping her.  Her farming has allowed her to help her husband.  In addition to this work, Ana also owns a small store which she is working hard to stock because the farm work is becoming very tiring.  For this reason, her dream is to have a well-established store.  Ana gets up very early, at 5.00am, to prepare her husband's breakfast as she has never liked him to go out without his morning coffee.

Ana sometimes buys the materials that she needs for her farm work in the city.  To catch the bus to the city she has to first walk for 30 minutes.  If she doesn't catch a motorcycle taxi it is a long journey.

Ana is requesting this loan from Fundación Campo to buy a bag of seed, two gallons of herbicides, 11 sacks of fertilizer and two liters of pesticides.  Through this investment, she will buy the supplies she needs for her crops as winter has already begun and her corn fields need fertilizing.

Ana would like to expand her small store as the farm work is becoming very tiring as she grows older.  She would also like to see her youngest daughter graduate.

loans.use: to buy a bag of seed, two gallons of herbicides, 11 sacks of fertilizer and 2 liters of pesticides

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
En su ciclo 8 se encuentra este grupo de la ciudad de Paraguarí, ellas se unieron con la esperanza de poder ayudar a sus familias y poder crecer cada una en su emprendimiento. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza como medio de ayuda para todas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Sandra, quien con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio día a día trabaja y lucha por s familia, su trabajo principal es la venta de chipa, el cual es un alimento típico paraguayo. La chipa se vende todo el tiempo en el año, es por eso que siempre tiene buena venta., además de eso comenta que ya tiene una clientela y que eso le ayuda mucho.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de chipas, para poder venderlas y así seguir invirtiendo en su emprendimiento, que es el sostén de su familia.
texts.en:
This group, from the city of Paraguarí, is in its eighth loan cycle. The members joined together in the hopes of being able to help their families and that each of their businesses will be able to grow every day. They want to eliminate poverty by helping everyone.
One of the members is Sra. Sandra. With great hard work and sacrifice every day, she works and fights for her family. Her main job is chipa sales. Chipa is a traditional [cheesy bread] Paraguayan dish that is sold in every season; it always sells well. Sandra tells us that she already has a good clientele and this helps her a lot.
She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of chipa so that she can sell it and keep investing in her business, which is her family's source of income.

loans.use: to buy chipa for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Luis Gonzalo

texts.es: Luis reside en la ciudad de Guayaquil – Ecuador, en el sector del Fortín, su negocio es la venta de cueritos reventados (un producto comestible tradicional de la ciudad) el proceso de producción lo aprendió de su suegro hace muchos años atrás, actualmente atiende el negocio todos los días con la ayuda de su esposa, el préstamo sera destinado para la compra de materia prima, específicamente cueros (que lo venden en cajas listo para freír en aceite)
texts.en: Luis lives in the Fortín sector of the city of Guayaquil, Ecuador.  His business is selling ‘cueritos reventados’ (a traditional food from the city).  He learned the productive process from his father-in-law many years ago and currently manages his business every day with his wife’s help.  The loan will be used to buy raw material, specifically the skins (that are sold boxed ready for frying in oil).

loans.use: to buy pork skin.

loans.name: Rolando Guillermo

texts.es: Rolando reside en la ciudad de Guayaquil – Ecuador, en el sector del Fortín, en sus inicios trabajo como ayudante en un taller vulcanizadora,  luego de ahorrar parte de su sueldo mensual decidio emprender su propio local, donde atiende desde las primeras horas del dia, el solo porque no tiene empleados ya que el negocio esta en proceso de crecimiento, el tiene como metas educar a sus hijos de la mejor manera, trabajar fuerte para hacer que el negocio crezca y tener una mejor estabilidad, con el préstamo comprara: Llantas, parches y aros para vehiculos.
texts.en: Rolando lives in the Fortín sector of the city of Guayaquil, Ecuador.  He started out working as a helper in a tire repair shop and after saving up part of his monthly salary decided to open his own shop where he works starting in the first hours of the day by himself because he doesn’t have any employees since the business is in the process of growing.  His goal is to educate his children the best way possible, to work hard to make the business grow and to have better stability.  He will use the loan to buy tires, patches and wheel rims for vehicles.

loans.use: to buy tires, patches and wheel rims.

loans.name: Panambi Group

texts.es:
Panambi es un grupo de 22 mujeres unidas y trabajadoras, que luchan por sus familias y que están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, como medio para pode conocer como cada una está en sus hogares y sus ingresos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Patricia quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de ingresos bueno, pero ella es consciente que debe seguir con su trabajo y esforzándose para seguir creciendo. Ella tiene un Kiosco bien surtido con todo tipo de productos, como ser bebidas, comestibles y demás, es con este negocio que lucha y tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y poder darles lo que necesitan para no pasar por ningún tipo de necesidades como las que ella tuvo que pasar.
Patricia pide de esta ayuda para poder invertirla en la compra de golosinas, comestibles, jugos, gaseosas, caramelos y demás insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas y mejorar así su situación de pobreza.
texts.en:
“Penambi” is a group of 22 united, hardworking women who strive for their families and who are taking the poverty elimination survey as a way of knowing how each one of them is in regard to her home and income.

One of the members is Patricia who in the previous survey was in a good income level but she’s aware that she must continue working and making the effort to continue growing.  She has a well-stocked kiosk with all types of product like beverages, food items and others.  It’s with this business that she’s able to have the means by which to help her family and to give them everything they need so they won’t have to go through the needs she had to.

Patricia is asking for this help to buy snacks, food items, juices, soft-drinks, candy and other supplies to continue with her sales and thus improve her poverty situation.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her stall.

loans.name: Jean

texts.es: Jean, de 19 años es un joven trabajador. Vive en compañía de su abuela a la que quiere mucho y con la que vive desde que nació. Él se encuentra muy agradecido por el apoyo que recibe de parte de su abuela, por lo que desea ser un profesional y poder brindarle todo lo que se merece. Es así que empezó ese camino de éxito y ahora estudia ingeniería de sistemas en una universidad muy reconocida de la zona. Gracias a su negocio de crianza de cerdos, puede pagar sus estudios. Comenta que le va muy bien en su negocio, pues cada mes vende un ejemplar maduro por lo que tiene que trabajar con anticipación en la maduración de los cerdos pequeños para tener un cerdo maduro siempre. Ahora desea incrementar sus ingresos para poder comprar cerdos de calidad y de buena carne para así aumentar el precio de compra. Éste es su primer crédito con KIVA y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero recibido, además se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuota. Jean, invertirá los S/.300 soles en la compra de más cerdos para su crianza.
texts.en:
Jean is a 19-year-old worker.  He lives with his grandmother who he loves very much and has lived with since birth.  He’s very grateful for the support he’s gotten from his grandmother which is why he wants to become a professional to be able to give her everything she deserves.

This is how he started on the road to success and is currently studying systems engineering in a very renowned university in the zone.  Thanks to his business raising pigs he’s able to pay for his studies.  He comments that he’s doing well in business because he sells a mature specimen every month so he must work with a prior plan in order to always have young pigs maturing.

He wants to increase income now in order to buy quality pigs that produce good meat so that he can increase sales price.  This will be his first Kiva loan and he feels grateful for the financial support received and commits to be punctual with his payments.  Jean will invest the 300 soles to buy more pigs to raise.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Washington Fernando

texts.es:
WASHINGTON tiene 28 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo de 8 meses de edad, vive con los padres en Ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es Integrante de la VRC GENESIS, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto atascoso, Pertenece al Cantón ventanas se dedican a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

WASHINGTON se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, se dedica a la crianza de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, semillas,abonos,  polvillo, morocho. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes y la alimentación de los pollos y cerdos.

Las compras y las ventas las realizará en Ventanas . El desafío a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y enfermedades en las siembras.

El sueño es comprar un terreno para tener mayores ingresos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbool.
texts.en:
Washington  is 28 years old. He is single and has an 8-month old child. He lives with his parents in Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios. He is a member of the "Genesis" Communal Bank, located in the rural community of Atascoso, in the canton of Ventanas. The members of this group carry out agricultural and livestock activities.
Washington grows corn and rice and raises poultry and pigs. He is asking for a loan to purchase urea, seeds, and fertilizer, for his crops, and an animal feed made from rice and a type of dense corn to feed his poultry and pigs. 
Washington makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas. His biggest challenges are pests and plant disease in his crops. His dream is to buy a piece of land to increase his income. In his spare time he likes to play soccer.

loans.use: to purchase urea, seeds, fertilizer, animal feed and a dense type of corn

loans.name: Julian

texts.es: Don Julian, casado hace 12 años, tiene un hijo, el es oriundo del departamento de Tarija, persona de caracter ameno, trabajador, hogareño y sobre todo muy responsable. Hace 15 años atrás se vino al tropico en busca de una mejor calidad de vida, actualmente el vive en la población de Puerto Aurora. El empezo trabajando en los chacos del lugar con pagos jornales, y poco a poco fue ahorrando y se compro un terreno en dicha población, luego se compro un lote agricola donde el junto a su esposa se dedico a la producción de platano, el cuenta que ahora con la experiencia que adquirio quiere aumentar la producción y para eso necesita una motosierra para asi poder chaquear su lote agricola de manera mas eficiente, y de esa manera tener mejores ingresos y mejor la calidad de vida de el y de su familia.
texts.en: Don Julian has been married for 12 years and has one child. He is from the department of Tarija. He is by nature pleasant, hard-working, a homebody, and very responsible. Fifteen years ago he came to this area in search of a better life. He currently lives in Puerto Aurora. He started working on the local farms as a day labourer. Bit by bit he saved up and bought a piece of land in Puerto Aurora. He later bought a plot of agricultural land where he and his wife produce bananas. He tells us that now, with the experience he has acquired, he wants to increase his production. For this, he needs an electric saw to clear his land more efficiently. This way he will have a better income and a better quality of life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy an electric saw.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
Matha tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera de 6 hijos. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse al comercio de comida como la elaboración y venta de pupusas, almuerzos, etc. Y en la elaboración  de flores actividades que ha desarrollado durante varios años, oficio que aprendió de sus  padres. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a sus hijos para preparar lo que venderán en el almuerzo. Luego, sus hijos se dirigen a la escuela, en la tarde prepara los ingredientes para elaborar pupusas lo que le genera ingresos para el sustento de su familia ya que ella, es padre y madre para todos sus hijos

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar lámina y cambiar el techo de su casa ya que se le moja y ampliar la acera de su casa, debido a que ahí atiende a sus clientes mientras están consumiendo sus alimentos. Con el mejoramiento de su vivienda atraerá más clientes para su negocio lo que le generara mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia

Ella planea en un futuro darles una educación universitaria a sus hijos y que lleguen hacer profesionales.
texts.en:
Matha is 58. She is a single mother of six. For several years she has made and sold food, including pupusas [a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans], lunches, etc. She has also sold flowers for several years. She learned her work from her parents. She gets up at 5:00 am with her children to prepare the food that she will sell at lunch time. Later, her children go to school. In the afternoons, she prepares the ingredients for making pupusas. This generates an income to support her family; she is both father and mother to all her children.
This loan, which she is requesting from Fundación Campo, is for the purchase of laminate and to change the leaky roof in her home. She will also expand the paved area where her customers eat. With this improvement to her home, she will attract more customers, and this will generate her more income to sustain her family.
In the future she plans to provide her children with a university education and to see them become professionals.

loans.use: to buy laminate and to change her home's leaky roof, and to expand the paving.

loans.name: Lidia Nohemy

texts.es: Lidia de 43 años de edad  vive con sus dos hijos, ella posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, alimentos enlatados, agua embotellada, verduras y otros productos más. Ella es una persona muy responsable y amable la cual cuenta con varios clientes a pesar que su tienda no tiene mucha variedad de productos. lidia solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de productos, ya que el mayor deseo de ella es el de poder surtir su negocio y así percibir mayores ganancias. lidia es una madre de familia muy responsable quien desea mucho poder brindarle todo lo mejor para que sus hijos tengan una mejor vida.
texts.en: Lidia, age 43, lives with her two children. She has a store where she sells basic staples such as bread, milk, eggs, canned goods, bottled water, and vegetables. She is a very responsible and kind person who has many clients even though she does not have a great variety of products. Lidia is requesting a loan so that she will have the money to buy a higher quantity of products. Her greatest desire is to be able to stock her business and have a greater income. Lidia is a mother and is very responsible. She very much wants to be able to provide all the best so that her children can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy basic staples, candy, oil, pop, water, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and lime powder at wholesale.

loans.name: Ngak's Group

texts.en:
Ngak, a rural villager in Siem Reap Province’s Srey Snom district, is 30 years old and a mother of three children, all of whom are in school. To meet family expenses, she has been growing rice for five years, earning about 10,000 KHR per day.

Ngak has been with Kiva’s partner VisionFund for three loans, all of which have helped improve her living conditions and all of which she has repaid. Now Ngak is leading her group of four to request a new loan, her portion of which she will use to buy pesticides and fertilizer for her farmland. She hopes to get a high yield from her rice paddy so as to keep her children in school.

loans.use: To buy pesticides and fertilizer for her farmland

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Las Palmeras Group

texts.es:
El grupo las palmeras se encuentra trabajando y este es su ciclo 9, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, que les sirve para conocer la situación de pobreza de cada una, para que así por medio de las capacitaciones puedan ir mejorando.
Una persona a destacar por su esfuerzo y su trabajo es la Sra. Olga, quien además de ser miembro, también es la presidenta del grupo, tratando siempre de apoyar a sus compañeras. Su labor también es la venta de ropas de todo tipo, siempre tiene muy buena variedad y es por eso que sus clientes siempre la prefieren.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de abrigos, buzos, camperas, bufandas y demás, ya que se acerca la época de frío y quiere poder tener una buena variedad de prendas que poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Las Palmeras group is in its ninth cycle. The members are currently carrying out an inquest into the elimination of poverty in order to know the situation of each one of the women. This way, through training, they will be able to improve.
One person who should be highlighted for her hard work is Olga. She is not just a member; she is the group president and always tries to support her groupmates. She sells all varieties of clothing and always has a very good variety; this is why her customers always prefer her business.
She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the purchase of coats, sweaters, jackets, scarves, and more. The cold season is coming up and she wants to be able to have a good variety of garments to offer her clients.

loans.use: to buy coats, sweaters, jackets, scarves, and more.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: Tomas de 55 años  de edad desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maiz y ajonjolí con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas y mejorar el terreno donde siembra que es el que muestra la fotografia pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito.
texts.en:
Tomás, 55, has worked in agriculture for many years; it’s his main source of income.  He grows corn and sesame and uses profits earned from his harvests to cover some of his household expenses.  He wants to buy the supplies he needs for his crops like manure, fertilizer and seeds and to improve the land where he does his planting and that’s shown in the photo.  

However, noting that he does not have the economic resources needed for said investment he’s decided to request a loan since only in this way will he be able to continue with his farming project.  Like all other farmers, he places his trust in agriculture because they have no other source of income and he wants to improve doing the best he can for his crops.  He hopes to obtain an abundant harvest that will make it possible for him to continue providing daily bread for his home and to repay this loan.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to improve his land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que la clienta solicita un crédito para comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The client lives in her own home. She is well-known in the area for her humility and her work ethic. She has never given up and has always overcome her difficulties. With hard work and dedication, she owns a store where she sells basic staples such as milk, eggs, and rice. She is very dedicated to her job and provides very good service. For this reason, she has customers who seek her out and prefer her products. She has found it necessary to stock her store a bit more because of an increase in demand. She does not have the capital to do so, so she is requesting a loan for the purchase of more products such as instant products, candy, drinks, etc. She trusts God that she will soon receive this help and be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic staples such as instant products, candy, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es: Ana de 33 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 15 y 10 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, Ana se dedica vender embutidos (mortadelas, jamón y salchichas) con la ayuda de su esposo vende en las diferentes tiendas y negocios de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar embutidos por mayor y así seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo para poder darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Ana, 33, lives with her husband and two children who are 15 and 10 years of age and attending school at the moment.  Ana sells cured meats (mortadella, ham and sausages) with her husband’s help; she sells to various stores and businesses in her place of residence and uses profits earned to help cover some of her household expenses. 

Ana’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to buy cured meats at wholesale to stay in business since this is her only source of work to be able to give her family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy cured meats at wholesale.

loans.name: Sigei

texts.en:
Sigei, who lives in the Litein area of Kenya, is the father of six children and has been a farmer for 11 years. His primary income sources are milk, eggs, and tea. The high cost of farming is his biggest challenge. School fees are his highest monthly expense.

Sigei chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan because of the good training it offers. He will use the loan to purchase poultry.

As part of Juhudi's loan appraisal process, each borrower's assets are evaluated. Sigei owns a cow and poultry. Juhudi Kilimo also tries to measure any change in living standards based on this loan. This borrower has in the household mosquito nets but does not have electricity, solar power, running water, a sewing machine, a TV, nor a DVD.

Note: To create this loan profile, Juhudi Kilimo used a mobile device to gather information in the field and send the data to a central online repository, thus reducing paper use, making the process more efficient, and keeping costs down.

loans.use: To purchase poultry

loans.name: Mercedes De Jesús

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 38 años de edad, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos. Se dedica a la agricultura  desde que tenia 13 años de edad,  su papá la llevaba a que le ayudara y le decía que aprendiera a trabajar pues le iba a servir cuando tuviera su hogar.  Luego se acompaño  y le fue mal, después encontró un gran hombre con el que se caso. Ella también le ayuda en la agricultura y además le gusta el comercio  y la venta, ella también vende pescado  y le gusta el negocio  de ropa, aunque es muy sacrificado la vida de ella, pues tiene que levantarse a las 4:30 de la mañana para preparar el desayuno  a su esposo y luego prepara a sus niños para la escuela, posteriormente se va a vender.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 2 galones de herbicidas para controlar la maleza, una bolsa de semilla, 8 sacos de abono. Con la inversión, sembrara maíz la tierra ya la tiene preparada pero necesita comprar los insumos. 

Ella  sueña con poder comprar un solar y construir una casa de ladrillo, ya que vive en  lo ajeno y en una casa de láminas.
texts.en:
Mercedes, 38, is married and has four children.  She’s been working in agriculture since she was 13-years-old; her father would take her along to help him and would tell her that she needed to learn to work because that would be useful when she had her own home.  

Later she took up with someone but it wasn’t good but after that she met a good man that she married.  She helps him with the agriculture and she also likes commerce; she sells fish and also likes the clothing business even though her life is very demanding because she must rise at 4:30 in the morning to prepare her husband’s breakfast and then get her children ready for school and after that head out to sell.

The loan she’s asking Fundación Campo for is to buy two gallons of herbicide to control weeds, a bag of seeds and 8 sacks of manure.  With this investment she will plant corn.  She’s already prepared the soil but needs to buy the supplies.  She dreams with being able to buy a piece of land to build a brick house since she currently lives in a house that is of metal sheeting on land that doesn’t belong to her.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Lesli

texts.es:
Lesli tiene una edad de 32 años es una mujer feliz mente casada y madre de 2 hijos con un grado de educación primaria completo el cual pudo cursar gracias al apoyo económico brindado por sus padres. El esposo de ella es maestro de educación primaria y agricultor y también trabaja la caficultura en sus horas no laborales. Fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra a muy temprana edad ya que en su familia el rubro de la agricultura especialmente el cultivo de café es una tradición y su único medio de ingreso económico para el sustento familiar.

Ella ha decidido inyectarle un poco de capital a sus cultivos de café por medio de un financiamiento por medio de la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos que protegerán su cosecha de los cambios climáticos, plagas entre otros como, el gramoxon, fertilizantes, abono, urea entre otros.

Sus planes a corto plazo es lograr incrementar el volumen de producción de café el cual pueda traer más ingresos para su familia y de esa forma poder apoyar a sus hijos con sus estudios y seguir formando un patrimonio para su bienestar en el futuro.
texts.en:
Lesli is 32 years old. She is happily married and has two children. She finished her primary education thanks to the financial support from her parents. Her husband works as a primary education teacher and also as a farmer in the coffee plantation in his spare time. Lesli learned from her parents how to farm the land at a very early age. In her family, farming, and coffee farming in particular, is a tradition and their only source of income.
Lesli has decided to inject some capital to her coffee plantation with the support from the field partner, "Cooperativa Comixmul". With the loan, she will buy supplies that will protect her crops from weather changes, pesticides such as "gramoxon", chemical fertilizers, manure, urea, etc. Lesli's short term goals include increasing the coffee production volume to bring more income home. In that way she hopes to support her children with their studies as well as establish some assets for their well-being in the future.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Nelly, de 47 años, es casada y tiene 4 hijos, pero solo viven con dos de ellos en su casa propia. Todas las mañanas desde hace 18 años, se despierta muy contenta; pues le gusta atender su pequeña tienda de productos comestibles tales como arroz, harinas, cafe, azúcar, entre otros. Nelly es muy conocida en su zona, porqué todo los sábados y domingos se dirige a la ciudad a comprar los productos que venderá en su tienda durante la semana. Ella es la única que abastece su zona con productos alimenticios, por ello le va muy bien en su negocio. Con el pasar de los años, Nelly equipó su tienda con carnes, azúcar, arroz y ahora quiere adquirir más productos para poder satisfacer las necesidades de los habitantes. Además tiene una tienda de fertilizantes naturales donde aprovecha para vender a los agricultores de su zona.
